item.title: How to Send Email in Nodejs
item.description: This is a series of articles on how to send an email in nodejs. In the first article, we will send an email using the node command. Later, we will create a APIs and a frontend. Sending emails in nodejs have only 2 requirements: Mail service provider (For ex. Gmail, Sendinblue, Mailchimp) Middleware to connect with mail service (For ex. nodemailer) Prerequisites Node.js (>v6.0.0 for nodemailer module) Code Editor (For Ex.
